ModuleAlreadyExistsError.descr: This error is raised at module load if another module with the same name already exists in sys.modules
ModuleAlreadyExistsError.message: A module with the same name {0} already exists in sys.modules : {1}

PluginDuplicateError.descr: This error is raised if the same plugin (name and version) is not unique across multiple directories
PluginDuplicateError.message: Duplicates plugins ({0}) found when adding repository {1}

PluginRepositoryDuplicateError.descr: This error is raised if the same plugin (name and version) is not unique
PluginRepositoryDuplicateError.message: Duplicates plugins (name = {0}, version = {1}) found in repository {2}

PluginModuleSysModuleDuplicateError.message: Module {0} (plugin : name = {1}, version = {2}, desc = {3}) already imported in sys.modules : {4}

PluginNotFound.descr: This error is raised if a plugin (by its name and version) is not found in the managed plugin context
PluginNotFound.message: Plugin name = {0} version = {1} does not exists

PluginNotExistsInRepository.message: Plugin name = {0} version = {1} does not exists in repository {2}

UnknownModuleError.message: Plugin name = {0} version = {1} does not have a module named {2}

PluginDescriptionMissingProperty.message: Property "{0}" is missing in plugin description file {1}
